memoryMessageStore.name: memoryMessageStore

params.name: Get
params.description:
messages from all the channel of a given bus
options : to specify a "since" parameter (ONLY supported parameter for now)
callback : function(message,error). message: retrieved message from channel, error: potential errors.

params.name: delete
params.description:
the bus
the bus MUST exist

params.name: delete
params.description:
the channel
the channel MUST exist

params.name: check
params.description: that message is a proper Backplane message with source, type and payload

return.description:
null
bus : must be a valid, existing bus
channel : if it does not exist, it will be created before pushing the message (MUST be base64 encoded)
content : a valid backplane message

params.name: Get
params.description:
messages from a given bus/channel
options : to specify a "since" parameter (ONLY supported parameter for now)
callback : function(message,error). message: retrieved message from channel, error: potential errors.

memoryMessageStore.description:
The memoryMessageStore class deals with:
- storing the message in memory
- validating messages
- bus and channel management (creation, access)
- providing messages (for bus and/or channel)
- cleaning outdated messages

TBind.name: TBind

return.description: The function passed in bound to the local scope

bind.description: A bind function which binds the scope of the funciton to be called to the local scope of the object.

params.name: fn
params.description: The function to bind the local scope to

TBind.description: A Trait class for holding helper functions for enforcing scope

Store.description:
Implements the Store. Deals with Bus and Channel construction/checking
